channel.title: Downloading A Client
channel.description:
I created my own client using Galkons Base and what not, but how do i upload it and get a DL link?i uploaded it file by file by file onto mediafire and it wont give me a link for a download on the WHOLE folder.It gives me a share link bu then that takes me to the open file in file management. please help me my players waiting impatiently __________________________________________________________________________
EDIT:: Nooby Mistake all i had to do was compress it and then upload haha im such a newb

item.title: Downloading A Client
item.dc:creator: @alexplt178 alexplt178
item.description:
@alexplt178 wrote:

use win rar and hit add file to “your files name” the go to uppit.com and brows for the rar file and hit upload Oo

Read full topic
